item.title: : Cyber Resilience Act (CRA)
item.description:
The European Union (EU) Cyber Resilience Act (CRA) is a regulation that “aims to set the boundary conditions for the development of secure products with digital elements by ensuring that hardware and software products are placed on the (European) market with fewer vulnerabilities and that manufacturers take security seriously throughout a product’s lifecycle.”

Source: https://eur-lex.europa.eu/legal-content/EN/TXT/?uri=CELEX%3A32024R2847
